10,000 ton Rider (Military Spaceship)

The 10000ton Rider design has been used by the Imperial Glisten Navy since the planet first achieved TL15. A mainstay of the fleet, it is found as the main battlerider class aboard the Lobachevsky class fleet tenders, as an auxiliary aboard some of the large battleships, and as an independent system defense monitor. Traditionally the individual vessels of this class do not have names. They are referred to tactically by a call sign based on that of their parent vessel, or by the last three digits of the tail number. They are also traditionally decorated with designs suggestive of fierce carnivores. Maneuver and life support power requires about 30% of the power plant full capacity, and the endurance shown below is calculated on that basis. Operation at full power consumes 3 endurance hours per hour of operation.
